text: « Composition of pancreatic juice —1200-1500 ml/day is produced containing: » Watery, alkaline solution (pH 8) to neutralize acidic chyme coming from stomach * Electrolytes, primarily HCO3~ * Digestive enzymes — Proteases (for proteins): secreted in inactive form to prevent self-digestion — Amylase (for carbohydrates) — Lipases (for lipids) — Nucleases (for nucleic acids)
